modName: Smithing Alchemy and Enchant Balance Overhaul
summary: If you like to have a perfect gear without breaking the game's difficulty, this is the mods for you.
descriptionHtml:
Every rpg hardcore gamer know that the best part of a rpg, is to craft to the maximum your gear to have the best gear possible in the game. But when it make the game too easy, we have a problem.

This mod remove the bonus of every perk for Smithing, enchant and alchemy. Now, Improving your item will only be affected by your smithing's level, The perk will only allow you to make the armor, and will not help you into improving them better. so basically, it'S 200% less improving value. Alchemist no longer boost your potion's magnitude and same thing for enchanter. Instead, the perk are replaced by "required to unlock Alchemy/enchanter's perks" and the max level is 1. So basically, your improving is 200% less effective, as well as your potion and enchanting too. With both those value reduced, you'll still be able to have a perfect gear that will do a lot more damage than an not improved weapon, but it won't let you to do non-sense like OS a bandit leader in master :/
author: Kevin Nadeau
